word: Christ\92s words were verily to the ruler the invitation, \93Choose you this day whom ye will serve.\94 Joshua 24:15. The choice was left with him. Jesus was yearning for his conversion. He had shown him the plague spot in his character, and with what deep interest He watched the issue as the young man weighed the question! If he decided to follow Christ, he must obey His words in everything. . . .
